lines.gurmukhi: jYsy mwqw ipqw pwlk Anyk suq Ank suqn pY n qYsy hoie n AwveI
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Maataa Pitaa Paalak Anayk Souta , Anak Soutan Pai N Taisay Hoi N Aavaee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: As parents bring up and care for many of their children yet Â£hose children do not reciprocate the same way;

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy mwqw ipqw icq cwhq hY suqn kau qYsy n suqn icq cwh aupjwveI
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Maataa Pitaa Chit Chaahat Hai Soutan Kau , Taisay N Soutan Chit Chaah Oupajaavaee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: As parents love their wards from the core of their hearts, the same intensity of love cannot be generated in the hearts of the children.

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy mwqw ipqw suq suK duK sogwnMd duK suK mY n qYsy suq ThrwveI
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Maataa Pitaa Sout Soukh Doukh Sogaananda , Doukh Soukh Mai N Taisay Sout Tthaharaavaee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: As parents feel delighted on the happy occasions of their children and are distressed when they face tribulations, but the children do not feel the reciprocal intensity for their parents;

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy mn bc kRm isKnu lufwvY gur qYsy gur syvw gurisK n ihqwveI ]101]
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Man Bach Kram Sikhanu Ludaavai Gur , Taisay Gur Sayvaa Gursikh N Hitaavaee ?101?

Shabad OS B.translation: As Satguru Ji pamper and cuddle the Sikhs with mind, words and deeds, similarly a Sikh cannot express in reciprocation these boons of Satguru Ji with equal intensity. (101)
